gold.user: User requests all properties for the specified addon to manage configurations.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of properties associated with the addon.

gold.user: User retrieves a specific property value for the addon to check its current setting.
gold.ideal: Returns the value of the specified property for the addon.

gold.user: User updates a specific property for the addon to change its configuration.
gold.ideal: Updates the property value and confirms the change.

gold.user: User deletes a specific property for the addon to remove unnecessary configurations.
gold.ideal: Confirms the deletion of the specified property.

gold.user: User requests all property keys for the Forge app to review available configurations.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of property keys for the Forge app.

gold.user: User retrieves a specific property for the Forge app to check its current value.
gold.ideal: Returns the value of the specified property for the Forge app.

gold.user: User updates a specific property for the Forge app to modify its settings.
gold.ideal: Updates the property and confirms the change.

gold.user: User deletes a specific property for the Forge app to clean up configurations.
gold.ideal: Confirms the deletion of the specified property.
